t: Amazon.com: Miles Davis' Greatest Hits [Vinyl LP record]: CDs & Vinyl
s: I ordered this CD for my husband, who is a big Miles Davis fan. Apparently, he’s been looking for this CD for the longest time. The CD was in very good condition, and there was no issues with sound. One track was a version of the Disney theme. I thought that was pretty cool.

t: Amazon.com: Kind Of Blue (Vinyl): CDs & Vinyl
Amazon.com: Kind Of Blue (Blue Marble Vinyl) [VINYL]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Miles Davis. Kind of Blue. Nuff said! ... Just the kind of jazz blues I was looking for! Glad I bought this! Update 2/2015: returned 1st album because of strange noise on this vinyl. Got another one and while this one did not have the noise it the piano fluttered on side one track one.
